duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage day-to-day accounting functions of the company and act as the Controller
Ensure accurate and timely financial reporting, including monthly financial statements
Complete General Ledger account reconciliations and oversee financial data at the transactional level
Manage payroll function and fiscal benefits management
Assume responsibility for revenue recognition and ensure FASB, GAAP, and other regulatory compliance
Partner with external auditing firm and deliver on annual financial audit requirements
Manage banking platforms and related cash-based activities
Oversee financial aspects of sales ordering and collections, including new customer financial set-up
Assist Operations function with monthly inventory close and liaison with the company’s cost analyst
Manage staff responsible for accounts payable, purchase order entry, fixed assets, and sales tax processing
Develop and implement policies and procedures with emphasis on internal controls and process improvements

education_certification.credential: BS / BA degree in Accounting; CPA and/or MBA preferred
Minimum of 8+ years in related position; Public accounting firm experience desirable
